Name: Grace of the Far Sea
Description: An epic weapon in the Verdant Oracle. Forged by upgrading <color=#ef8e60>Luminous World Ring</color>, this weapon can be further enhanced in future seasons using a small amount of Glinting Stellar Core.
Description2:
"In the realm of ebbing tides, the sea leaves behind its final sigh.
The shattered reflections of starlight float on the water, like dreams yet unbroken.
Listen! Each rising tide is the heartbeat of a gentle and solemn deity.
The light surging through the ring soothes bloodstains, granting peace to weary souls."
(Excerpt from "Book of the Depths I")
